main event: A UFO sighting was reported involving two round, basketball-shaped white objects in Waverly, Iowa on 21 December 1957.
interesting points: The objects had streaks of fire trailing behind them for a second or longer., The sighting lasted approximately 5 seconds., The objects disappeared halfway across the sky and then reappeared before dimming out., The report originates from a civilian source., The course of the objects was south.
witness description: 51-year-old farmer from Iowa who wore glasses
